description:
Description
===========
There is no way to reset the instance key pair, even during the rebuild procedure.


Expected result
===============
`nova rebulid` will be a good approach to reset the instance key pair.
title: Cannot reset the instance key pair while rebuilding

comments.content:
Description
===========
There is no way to reset the instance key pair, even during the rebuild procedure.


Expected result
===============
`nova rebulid` will be a good approach to reset the instance key pair.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dragon889

comments.content: Can you explain what you are expecting to happen that is not currently happening? It seems like rebuild should use the existing keypair, I'm not sure why you would change it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: What if the user lost the original private key ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dragon889

comments.content: This looks more like a feature request. If you would like to introduce this behavior into Nova, please propose a blueprint. https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/Blueprints
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~auggy

comments.content:
